div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 16:35 pm CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 74. Breezy, with a south wind around 20 mph.

A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low around 46. South southeast wind 5 to 15 mph becoming west after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Sunny, with a high near 82. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph becoming east in the afternoon.
